messages.@dapps.button.network_not_supported: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to perform this action
messages.@dapps.navbar.wrong_network.message: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use this app, but you are currently connected to {currentChainName}.
messages.@dapps.navbar.wrong_network.message_unkn: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use this app, please switch your network to continue.
messages.@dapps.sign_in.options.desktop: You can use the {metamask_link} extension or your email account
messages.@dapps.sign_in.options.mobile: You can use mobile browsers such as {coinbase_link} or {imtoken_link}.
messages.@dapps.login.modal.title: Sign In
messages.@dapps.login.modal.subtitle: Choose how you want to connect to Ethereum.
messages.@dapps.login.modal.supported_wallets: Trezor and smart contract wallets like Dapper, Argent or Gnosis safe, do not work with Polygon. Read more about the Trezor support status {trezor_link}
messages.@dapps.login.option.mobile_and_browser: Using your mobile or browser extension
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.modal.title: Buy MANA
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.modal.subtitle: Select what MANA you want to buy:
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.feedback_modal.pe: Wait a few minutes while the transaction is being processed
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.feedback_modal.su: The {network} MANA has been added to your account. If you still don't see it in your balance, refresh this page.
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.feedback_modal.fa: You can try again with {gateway} or select other provider
Use it to buy LAND, names and specific wearables in Ethereum.
You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.
You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.network.matic.cta: Use it to buy most wearables and emotes in Polygon.
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.network.matic.moo: You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.
messages.@dapps.buyManaWithFiat.network.matic.tra: You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.
messages.@dapps.toasts.meta_transactions.contract: Smart contract wallets are not supported for meta-transactions. You can switch your network to Polygon and send a regular transaction.
messages.@dapps.toasts.meta_transactions.invalid_: The contract address is not available for meta-transactions. You can switch your network to Polygon and send a regular transaction.
messages.@dapps.toasts.meta_transactions.sale_pri: The price is too low for this meta-transaction. You can switch your network to Polygon and send a regular transaction.
messages.@dapps.toasts.meta_transactions.unknown_: There was an unexpected error sending the meta-transaction. You can switch your network to Polygon and try sending a regular transaction.
messages.@dapps.toasts.meta_transactions.high_con: Polygon Network gas prices are too high! Please wait and try again later, or switch your Network to Polygon and pay for the gas fee with MATIC.
messages.@dapps.network_alert.title: Your wallet is connected to Polygon
messages.@dapps.network_alert.content: Use this network to cover the gas of a transaction (like when buying items below 1 MANA). Switch back when you finish. <link>Learn more</link>
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.waiting_walle: Confirm the transaction on your wallet
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.title: Complete your {action}
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.spending_cap_: Remember to set a cap equal to the item price {price} MANA or higher.
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.revoke_cap_er: Remember to set a spending cap of 0 MANA in order to revoke your previous one.
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.insufficient_: Your spending cap is not enough to cover the purchase amount of {price} MANA. To proceed, please adjust your spending cap equal or higher. Revoke the current spending cap and retry with an appropriate limit.
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.authorize_man: First, authorize the <contract></contract> contract to operate MANA on your behalf in Decentraland.

Keep in mind that some wallets require setting a custom MANA spending limit. Enter the item price {price} MANA or a higher amount you're comfortable with for spending now or later. You can change the limit at any time.
Remember to set a cap equal to the item price {price} MANA or higher.
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.authorize_nft: First, authorize the <contract></contract> contract to operate your <targetContract></targetContract> NFTs on your behalf in Decentraland
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.revoke_cap.de: Your current spending cap is lower than {price} MANA. You'll have to revoke your current spending cap before making a new one.
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.set_cap.title: Set a new spending cap
messages.@dapps.authorization_modal.set_cap.descr: Enter the item price {price} MANA or a higher amount you're comfortable with for spending now or later. You can change the limit at any time.
messages.@growth.FilterContainerModal.title: filters
messages.@growth.WalletSelector.title: Sign In
messages.@growth.WalletSelector.subtitle: Choose a method to connect
messages.@growth.WalletSelector.trezor: Trezor and smart contract wallets (like Dapper or Argent) cannot interact Polygon. Read more about the Trezor support status [here](https://github.com/trezor/trezor-firmware/pull/1568)
messages.@growth.WrongNetworkModal.message: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use this app, but you are currently connected to {currentChainName}.
messages.@growth.ShareModal.title: Share this Place
